import React, { useState } from 'react' import cl from './addItem.module.scss' import Input from '../Input/Input' const AddItem = ({ listItems, setListItem }) => { const [state, setState] = useState({ invisible: false, visible: false }) const [inputValue, setInputValue] = useState('') const inputStyles = { padding: '7px 30px 7px 5px', fontSize: '14px', } const addNewCategory = () => { setInputValue('') return inputValue ? setListItem([...listItems, inputValue]) : false } const closeNewCategory = () => { setInputValue('') return setState({ invisible: true, visible: true }) } return (
) } export default AddItem
